name: wfarr
body:
# Hello

I'm @wfarr. I work on Ops and Culture Tools at GitHub. I speak at user groups and conferences sometimes too. If you'd like to contact me, the best ways to do so are [twitter](http://twitter.com/wfarr) and [email](mailto:wcfarrington+blogform@gmail.com).

## Projects

* [Boxen](https://github.com/boxen)
* Henson â€” Open Sourcing soon-ish.

## Talks

If you think you might be interested in asking me to speak at your event, I recommend perusing some of my previous slide decks. I've linked some of my personal favorites below and if you like what you see, do send me an email:

* [Boxen: Managing an Army of Laptops with Puppet](https://speakerdeck.com/wfarr/boxen)
* [Graphs for the Fucking Win](https://speakerdeck.com/wfarr/graphs-for-the-fucking-win)
* [Kanban](https://speakerdeck.com/wfarr/kanban)
* [Learn You Some Riak](https://speakerdeck.com/wfarr/learn-you-some-riak)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
